import React from 'react'; import './ContentPanel.css'; import './Skills.scss' import $ from 'jquery'; var bgColors = { "Orange": "#EA8D4E", "Red": "#E46765", "Blue": "#3E99CD", "Navy": "#4A637B", "Purple": "#807798", "Pink": "#D46E8F" }; $(document).ready(function(){ var $timeline_block = $('.cd-timeline-block'); //hide timeline blocks which are outside the viewport $timeline_block.each(function(){ if($(this).offset().top > $(window).scrollTop()+$(window).height()*0.75) { $(this).find('.cd-timeline-img, .cd-timeline-content').addClass('is-hidden'); } }); //on scolling, show/animate timeline blocks when enter the viewport $(window).on('scroll', function(){ $timeline_block.each(function(){ if( $(this).offset().top <= $(window).scrollTop()+$(window).height()*0.75 && $(this).find('.cd-timeline-img').hasClass('is-hidden') ) { $(this).find('.cd-timeline-img, .cd-timeline-content').removeClass('is-hidden').addClass('bounce-in'); } }); }); }); const Skills = React.forwardRef((props, ref)=>{ return (
Skills
